locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ TA/Petro has done such a poor job negotiating with larger fleets, they‚Äôve found themselves out of most fuel networks, which means you get to pay $18 for a dirty shower here now. ‚Ä¶
Nice clean place to take a shower with enough parking.

‚Ä¶ gotta say their shop is very nice and clean! Shop employees are super nice and efficient... Got us right in and fixed up in no time! Shower was nice, big and clean! Now for the ugly... Country Pride only had one older lady waitress who was ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ taco bell employees and shower attendees were great!  Big parking lot and it's spaced out properly so backing is easy and showers are spacious, clean and a good size! ‚Ä¶

Stopped for the night as we do every night as my boyfriend drives for a living.. Was there about 2 hours doing laundry, shower and dinner. The assistant manager called the police on me accusing me of ( working) and going into the showers ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I know they not gonna build a other one. Also if you get an oil change or work done in there shop can't get a shower  on your ultra one card, never mind that you just spend good money. So there you have it people and a monopoly on ‚Ä¶
Workers very nice clean shower bathrooms women's they were working on it to get it  clean wish we were hungry would have liked to get a taco very happy with TA
Owners an incredibly stingey person....16 $ to shower, never any overnight food, parking lots trashed. Same owner as Sawyer...and look at that trash heap....
Decent parking only a few reserved spots.  Decent shower.  Good food options
Loved this place. Clean bathroom, shower, laundry, and food. Everything available here.

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ $ 25 for a shower! Pilot is well-known for price gouging Class A operators, but this branch takes the thievery to a whole new level. It's like shopping at an Airport, without the joy of someone else transporting you. ‚Ä¶
$25 for a shower and the lady at the register was very smug, unhelpful, and rude.
‚Ä¶ Today I needed to do my 2 hour split log break so I stopped to shower and eat ‚Ä¶
This store is pretty clean staff is ok I always try to spend the night at pilot or flying j. I been driving 10 years and $25 for a shower is a joke they're usually between $12-$17 in other places

Good Place to go, sleep, eat, shower. For the most part polite, but sometimes you run into those unhappy people. Just be polite weather they are or not . Set the tone for a pleasant Day! Mostly
Clean; and decent .
Usually if I'm writing a review on a pilot shower it's negative.  But this is the 2nd time I've taken a shower here and it's very clean! That means alot to truckers! Thank you!!

More than one hour to get a shower they say the system  was down but according to others drivers  they been waiting  for more  than that at that place  really no excuses for something  like that we the drivers want to take a shower and ‚Ä¶
Don‚Äôt come here for a shower if you don‚Äôt have shower credits, it‚Äôs insane $25 for one, the TA down the street has them for $17, and plenty of parking at the fireworks store across the way.
Nice, clean, and good people. Had a glitch checking into a shower via the app and without question the ladies at the counter took care of me. Still got my shower üòÅ. Thanks ladies!! ‚Ä¶
Holy shit 25 for a shower in this dump!!!!! Me and my co driver got 2 in Vegas for 28!!!!!

locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Parking lot is a tad sketchy but the store is super nice and clean. No wait at all for a shower and ordered a pizza. Tons of parking though. Maybe get a reserved spot as they are up front.

‚Ä¶ a reset. It was quiet (for a truck stop). I didn't see anyone loitering or hitting drivers up for cash. I took a good long hot shower in a clean shower room. I really have no complaints. I arrived at 21:30 and there was still surprising a ‚Ä¶

This place is suck , full of lazy 17 showers but nobody want to clean , I got 3 people ahead of me , I wait 1 1/2 to get showers when I ask at counter , the lazy lady show me attitude, the guy who clean shower,  he walk around here and ‚Ä¶

Some of the best people and some of the most helpful people. I did not have a shower on my card and they went out of their way to help me get one.. This is the only place I stop when I come to the Chicago area. ‚Ä¶

My shower was lukewarm at best. I had Goosebumps through the entire shower. Then at 8pm When I was trying to get some sleep I heard a knock on my door. It was the parking police. He said I either needed to move go pay for parking or he was ‚Ä¶
$25 for a shower? Those are California prices just go to Illinois $17. Truck stops rip Drivers off. Prices are stupid! Shop Ma and PA stops!

I haven't fueled up here in a while so I didn't have any shower credits. I'm a truck driver. I went in to just pay for a shower and was shocked that it cost $25. The company I drive for is a mega carrier, which means we buy tens of ‚Ä¶
Unprofessional people, 25 people working, no one cleans shower, manager 70  years old lady, doesn‚Äôt know what to do.
Good service, good service, great shower, tidy. everything clean. I recommend.

You guys charge $25 for a shower and we can not even get soap or a toilet seat?!?!
I think that's a little messed up

locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: outstanding love's. tons of parking and very easy to get into. the showers were perfect, most pressure i've ever felt from a shower head, honestly a little painful. the taco john's inside is to die for.

Came about 2PM, plenty truck parking spot.
Nice shower, good water pressure.
So many people are working here but nobody cleaning washrooms waiting for an hour for shower. They talk rudely once if someone told them to clean the washroom.

I was excited about this new loves in town. I used to go to gary all the time. I visited today first time and booked the shower ( no. 6 ) when i went inside i was used but not cleaned all the towels were on the floor and was dirty i came ‚Ä¶

Best shower in the entire country! Great water pressure very clean showers a large facility with plenty of parking and plenty of room to move around in the shower room. They should make all loves like this one
It‚Äôs clean and new store. I love their big shower rooms and also a lot of parking lots spaces also good food.thanks taking care truckers

‚Ä¶ place you will get tow. Example is your stopping to get a quick shower and you don't find a parking spot and you go and take a shower ones you cone out you will not find your truck where you left it. This is just redeculus since we ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ but....it is designed for "4 wheelers".  The building is a bit of a walk and this will only delay further how long it takes for Drivers to shower and get back to their trucks parked at the fuel island.  The DEF pumps are eXtremely slow.
Wasted my time waiting for shower then cancelled my shower after 2 hours üëéüèæ ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I stopped here to take a shower, showers clean good water pressure that's a check ‚úîÔ∏è Than I got coffee with a gallon of water helped by a cashier named Jose wow such a great dude professional was a good guy than I went to subway young lady ‚Ä¶

Shower is very small not clean mirror was,dirty and there was hair all over sink and toilet.Store overall needs some attention. Wasn't happy spoke to manager he didnt offer any solution. Unfortunately after traveling I needed a shower. So I ‚Ä¶

The worst Pilot shower I had. Not just because of its so tiny and no place to put stuff. (I had to put the on the floor.) Also, the water is almost dripping. Very poor. Plus hard to control temperature. Very disappointed.

Small stop .  Be careful when you opening the showers.  Because the door the men's restroom opens outwards and there is only tiny space between showers and restrooms.  Believe me almost every other customer who try to open shower #1 or 2 ‚Ä¶
Terrible staff. specially a shuman wgo drives people ut of the shower. take into consideration you have a terrible staff.
Shower rooms tiny. They have shower curtains . Better than nothing. Lil creature walking to the trash can, didn't want to find out what kind of creature.
Parking was tight, but it is a small pilot. Staff was very friendly. Shower was clean and water was hot.
I agree with most that while it is small for parking spots, shower capacity, and restrooms; it has a SUBWAY!!!
